alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 3:07PM MST until February 16 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the lower terrain. The mountainous areas will receive 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Casper Mountain, Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and snow covered road conditions. The wintry conditions will impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
